channel.title: How to add on 614
channel.description:
Ok a few questions...
1. How do i add the npcs on a 614 source,
2. how do i add commands and block items
3. How do i change my character to an owner?
will someone please help with this

item.title: How to add on 614
item.dc:creator: @Tr3vor Tr3vor
item.description:
@Tr3vor wrote:

  1. Source>Data>Npcs.cfg
    Add your Npcs there… Example:
    npc = 652 3091 3497 0
    Npc ID X co-ord Y co-ord Height

  2. Source>src>dragonkk>rs2rsps>net>packets>CommandHandler.java
    Add commands there.

  3. Source>src>dragonkk>rs2rsps>net>Frames.java
    Once you open Frames.java, press CTRL and F at the same time and search for admins.
    Replace the first persons name (in the “” marks) with your name. That’ll make you admin.

Read full topic
